numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I notice a pattern in the percentages of players of color and head coaches of color.
2. The percentage of players of color is higher than the percentage of head coaches of color.
3. I notice that there are 4 graphs from 2020.
4. I notice that there is 1 graph from 2019.
5. The graph from 2019 is from the Women's National Basketball Association.
6. I wonder if there is a reason.
7. I wonder why there are more players of color than head coaches of color.
9. My community has many people of color.
10. In my community, the percentage of people of color who become players is high.
11. In my community, it may be difficult for people of color to find coaches of color that they can relate to.
12. This graph shows the difference between players of color and head coaches of color overall.
13. The headline is: The difference in players of color and head coaches of color in sports.
